metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14872 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _dtoa_r function of the newlib libc library, prior to version 3.3.0, performs multiple memory allocations without checking their return value. This could result in NULL pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnewlib-arm-none-eabi - 3.3.0-1.3
newlib-source - 3.3.0-1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: newlib package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.3.0-1.3').
